content: with 1 slip_stitch in the first v_stitch in this row row 5 shells cast on in the v_stitch where you ended your last row slip_stitch chain 3 4 double_crochet shell all in the same v_stitch 1 single_crochet in the 3rd double_crochet from 2 row below corner shell 5 double_crochet in first chain 1 space 1 single_crochet in chain 3 space 5 double_crochet in next chain 1 space 1 single_crochet in the 3rd double_crochet from 2 row below corner shell 5 double_crochet in next v_stitch 1 single_crochet in chain 3 space 5 double_crochet in chain 3 space 1 single_crochet in the 3rd double_crochet from 2 row below make a shell 5 double_crochet in every v_stitch repeat this instructions until you are at the end of the row close with a slip_stitch in 3rd chainstitch of the first shell this is a repeating pattern *1 row v-stitches and chains row 4 *1 row shells and single_crochet row 5 you can make it as big as you want and use the yarn of your own choice i hope you have fun with this version of the shells blanket design by mbdesign october 2016 lisserbroek the netherlands ©
